titles.title: PFAS Free Foam Research and Development Act
PFAS Free Foam Research and Development Act
PFAS Free Foam Research and Development Act
To direct the Secretary of Defense to award grants and carry out other activities to develop alternatives to aqueous film-forming foam, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Armed Services, and in addition to the Committee on Science, Space, and Technology, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
